Class Patient

java.lang.Object
hms.User
hms.Patient
public class Patient extends User
The Patient class represents a patient user in the hospital management system. It extends the User class and provides functionalities specific to patients, such as viewing and updating medical records, scheduling appointments, and giving feedback.

  • Constructor Details

    • Patient

      public Patient(Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Constructs a new Patient by prompting for information via a Scanner. Initializes the patient record and saves it to file.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner object for reading user input.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during saving operations.

    • Patient

      public Patient(String id, String name, String password) throws IOException
      Constructs a new Patient with the specified ID, name, and password. Loads the patient's medical record if it exists; otherwise, creates a new one.
      Parameters:
      id - The patient's ID.
      name - The patient's name.
      password - The patient's password.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during operations.

  • Method Details

    • eventLoop

      public boolean eventLoop(Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      The main event loop for the patient, providing a menu of options to interact with the system.
      Specified by:
      eventLoop in class User
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner object for reading user input.
      Returns:
      true to continue the loop; false to log out.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during operations.

    • rescheduleOrCancelAppointment

      public void rescheduleOrCancelAppointment(Scanner scanner)
      Allows the patient to reschedule or cancel an existing appointment. Prompts the patient to select an appointment to cancel and optionally schedule a new one.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner object for reading user input.

    • scheduleAppointment

      public void scheduleAppointment(Scanner scanner)
      Allows the patient to schedule a new appointment by selecting from available slots.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner object for reading user input.
